nodes.text: The X10-D draft droid was a droid developed by the Trandoshan species for labor. They were able to pick up things that Trandoshans—due to their claws—could not. Only those deemed worthy by the Scorekeeper—those who had achieved a significant number of Wookiee kills—could own a draft droid.
The bounty hunter Bossk once owned a red and bronze X10-D, which he used aboard his ship, the Hound's Tooth. The droid's mind was replaced with that of Flirt.
The Bartokk Queen and a hive took a number of X10-Ds and input hidden mini plasma bombs as part of their plan to attack Corulag Academy.
